ExtendedSection.Title: Using the extended content section for single sections

Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
If the extended content section is used like a regular content section, the output is identical to the regular content section. This is the case if

  • There is only ONE subsection.
  • The Heading of the first and only subsection is NOT set.
  • The element setting Type of list is set to "As divisions".
